item.description: People don't seem to be showing up. Is that from a lack of interesting places to meet? Who knows, but try and come on out to this historic Boston pub and we'll find out. Even if you're not interested in history, you can still say you went to a place with the same name as in a Tolkien book.

group.name: The Boston Dungeons & Dragons Meetup Group

item.name: The Boston Dungeons & Dragons October Meetup
